title: Netflix content watching worldwide by device 2017
summary: This chart shows the percentage of Netflix represented in watching worldwide Platform in Netflix .
\\n From the chart we see that the lowest amount of Netflix content came from Mobile with 24 % , followed by 15 % of Netflix content in PC/laptop .
Next we see there were around 56 % of Netflix content in Mobile followed by 70 % in Television .
gold: The figure shows the share of time spent watching Netflix worldwide in 2017 , by device . According to the source , 70 percent of content streamed on Netflix worldwide in 2017 was via a connected TV .
